panels.title: DB claims with ready db state

panels.description: Calculates the total rate of reconciliations per minute for the databaseclaim controller.
panels.title: Reconciliation Rate

panels.description: Displays the 95th percentile of reconciliation duration for the databaseclaim controller over a 5-minute window.
panels.title: Reconciliation Duration

panels.description: Calculates the percentage of successful reconciliations over the total number of reconciliations for the databaseclaim controller.

targets.legendFormat: rate of successful reconciliations over the last minute

panels.title: Reconciliation Success Rate

panels.description: Calculates the total rate of reconciliation errors per minute for the databaseclaim controller.

matcher.options: total rate of reconciliation errors per minute

targets.legendFormat: total rate of reconciliation errors per minute

panels.title: Reconciliation Errors

panels.description: Shows the current depth of the work queue for the databaseclaim controller.
panels.title: Work Queue Depth

panels.description: Displays the 95th percentile of time items spend in the work queue for the databaseclaim controller.

matcher.options: 95th percentile of time items spend in the work queue

targets.legendFormat: 95th percentile of time items spend in the work queue

panels.title: Work Queue Latency

panels.description: Displays the 95th percentile of time taken to process items in the work queue for the databaseclaim controller.

matcher.options: 95th percentile of time taken to process items in the work queue

targets.legendFormat: 95th percentile of time taken to process items in the work queue

panels.title: Work Queue Processing Duration

panels.description: Shows the maximum time that any item has been waiting in the work queue for the databaseclaim controller.
panels.title: Longest Work Queue Waiting Time

panels.description: Calculates the rate of work queue retries per minute for the databaseclaim controller.

targets.legendFormat: rate of work queue retries per minute

panels.title: Number of Work Queue Retries
